activities: Data can be uploaded to our servers for the purposes of sending targeted digital communications to the data subject via our e-mail distribution software. This can be performed by an End User organization or a Partner organization that is licensed to do so, or by Alterian themselves if required. Generally, Alterian will simply be maintaining the system that performs the delivery and will not have any direct interaction with the data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Utilize private sector dispute resolution program via the Direct Marketing Association (DMA) (of which applicant is already a member).
